page.title: 16WEST SCUNTHORPE SCHOOLS (2)
page.content: {Berkeley Junior School,}built in 1969 is also singled storied with a flat roof.There are 10 classrooms_8 classes 9 teachers(inc.Head)and 230 pupils.Av. class is 30.Age range 7_11.Pupils walk to school.There is a uniform but it is not worn. {Berkeley Infants School,}built in 1968 is also single storey & flat roofed. There are 9 classrooms(6 classes) 7 teachers(inc.Head) and 170 pupils. Age range 4+_7+.There is a uniform but it is not worn.Pupils are local and walk. {INTERVIEW _Mr.& Mrs.Green}have lived on the Berkeley Estate for 31 years.It was called{America Plantation}.In 1954 it had 1 small shop & few 'phones. The shops were built 25 years ago.Gypsies usedto live on the (now) school fields until building started.A stream used to run through the school grounds but is now covered in.
